name: Orbiter (itch) (Wobbumash)
description:
Hello again!

This is a project i've been working on during my vacation from work. I worked on this for about a week while balancing between work and free time, but it came out as something far better than I anticipated. I'm adding the sound effects and the BGM I intended to put on the game as bonus files, you guys can use it on your projects however you please :)

Donations are appreciated as a form of support, but everything I make is available for free!

Critics are more than welcome, since I'm trying to improve on each project that I work on!
